data.value: You went after your victim but he was not at home.

data.value: Today you tried to take control of someone's else mind. Who know what happened…

data.name: SerialKillerActKILL
data.value: In one house, heart-rending screams and cries for help were heard.

data.name: StartAction
data.value: Night has began, nobody knows what will happened soon…

data.name: TCultusLeaderAct
data.value: You have been recruited into the cult. You have abandoned all your ideals.

data.name: TDriverAct
data.value: Tonight you decided to go to another part of the city by taxi.

data.name: TerroristAct
data.value: Explosions were heard throughout the city, waking up all residents.

data.name: TEscortAct
data.value: A beautiful stranger wandered to you, you could not resist her postponed all your deals.

data.name: TEscortActOTHER
data.value: A lady friend came to you and complained about her live for a very long time.

data.name: TEscortActSELF
data.value: You spent this night alone with yourself contrary to whatever plans you had.

data.name: TGodfatherAct
data.value: You were recruited into the mafia clan offering untold fame and wealth in return for a small favor.

data.name: THealAct
data.value: You woke up and it seems that the past was merely a dream, however soon you find stitches on your body.

data.name: TKillAct
data.value: There were some noises in your house…

data.name: TKillActSUICIDE
data.value: You realized that you would never do that but your body dod not obey you. You fought the desire to commit suicide but it was all in vain…

data.name: TRessurectAct
data.value: Despite your injures you do not feel that your vitality is leaving you. You do not feel anything at all.

data.name: TWitchAct
data.value: You were overtaken by an acute to commit some act against your will as if your mind was controlled by someone.

data.name: VigilanteActKILL
data.value: A rifle shot sounded somewhere nearby.
